column2: "...You don't seem to be weaker at all."
"That's my line. If all you do is work, then you'll get soft."
"...Huey. Why are you standing on that side? I'm on this side...!"
"Claris Claes... Can you still hear Clarissa's voice...?"
"Everyone seems to be at a loss, huh? No one's going all out, it would seem."
"Well, if Regius and Maria went all out, this place would disappear. That sort of thing... it won't happen."
"Claris Claes didn't think she'd be fighting other ARKS either, so it can't be helped."
"Keeping that in mind, the one who can fight most efficiently would be me... Not that it would go smoothly."
"<%me>. You and that lady over there are magnificently skilled. Leaving everyone else aside, I applaud you."
"However, the one over there, frankly, is a let-down... or rather, out of her league."
"Sh... Shut up...!"
"Looking at your gifts, you have an aptitude for supporting roles, but trying close combat... Are you trying to imitate Zeno, perhaps?"
"Even him, when stretching his talents too thin, fell short in his battle against Elder..."
"Won't acting like that just hold back people like <%me> and them?"
"But then... I can't protect anyone."
"I don't know if Zeno survived, but if I can't protect anyone else... What's the point?"
"That's why Zeno stood in front. Not with a gun, but with a sword. Before anyone else, in front of everyone..."
"Even if it's as you say, even if I become a burden... I won't let you reject that ideal!"
"It's not like I don't understand what you're saying."
"However, you can't let yourself get provoked so easily."
"Zeno!"
"Well said, Echo."
"Oooh, right at the scary part. Looks like the easygoing one was right."
"That's..."
"...Ha, you finally came."
"That crest... Number Four of the Six? That seat... it should have been empty?"
"Not everything Clarissa says is true, Claris Claes."
"Yo, <%me>. Also, Echo, long time no see."
"My bad, I got delayed on my way here. This weapon, it doesn't seem to like to listen to me, so I barely got here on time..."
"Oi, Echo? Echooooo? Ms. Echo?"
"Zeno..."
"Oh, you finally responded. I thought you forgotten my face after so long,  but it looks like I jumped to conclusions."
"Tss!"
"...Ow! What was that for?!"
"Idiot! Idiotidiotidiot! If you were alive then you should've contacted me! You should've come right back!"
"S- shut up! I had a situation of my own, you know!"
"I almost got killed over and over again by Ane-san!"
"Disrespectful. You almost died on your own, didn't you?"
"I don't care about that, idiot! Do... Do you know how long I waited for you?!"
"Do you have any idea how lonely I was?! Just how scared I was?!"
"Just how... scared... did you think I was, you idiot?!"
"...I'm sorry."
"Forgive me for now. Before you get spitting mad at me, there's something that has to be done."
"...I mean, haven't you had it hard up until now?"
"...haha. As always, I can't hide anything from Zeno."
"You've endured too much. Don't push yourself too hard."
"...Okay."
"'cuse me, miss. Sorry, but could you hold onto Echo for a bit?"
"Ah, y-yes!"
"...Zeno!"
"Huh?"
"It's been a while since you took center stage, huh? Use all your strength! Do him in!"
"Yeah!"
"Long time no see, Casra. I didn't think I'd be greeting you with a gunshot, though."
"The same goes for me. I didn't imagine you would survive that situation."
"It's thanks to <%me> that I barely got out with my life."
"That's why I gotta repay the favor."
"New Number Four of the Six... as you'll be known from here on, huh? With this, the Even Numbers are complete."
"And that Commandment Sword Nanaki... I never thought someone would appear that could wield it."
"Right? Looks like being a Hunter wasn't a complete waste, then."
"...There's no mistake. Allow me to withdraw my previous statement. From here on out... this is the real deal."
"Expressive Wisp... Florenbelc."
"<%me>...Looks like Mr. Slave's getting serious."
"Then, in that case, let's show him some teacher & student teamwork."
"Sword of the Resounding Commandment... Nanaki!"
"...Hey, Claris Claes. Are you having fun?"
"Don't you always say that? You want to do fun stuff, right? What about now? Is it fun?"
"Oi, can you hear me...? Answer me, Claris Claes!"
"Shut up, shutupshutupshutup! Don't deceive me! Don't question me! I'm fine as long as I have Clarissa!"
"Clarissa teaches me everything... everything is fine! Stuff like being wrong, won't happen!"
"...I see."
"Then playtime is over. I am Number Six of the Six, and you are Number Five of the Six, Claris Claes, and I will stop you."
"Wake up and smash... Walfran!"
"Steel your heart, Claris Claes! This... is what you call hostility!"
"U...Uuu, aaaaaaah! Clarissaaaaa!!"
